EazyBuy is the ultimate shopping assistant for Amazon enthusiasts. This innovative Chrome extension allows you to highlight any word or phrase on a webpage and instantly find matching items on Amazon with just a click. Whether you’re casually browsing or hunting for a specific product, EazyBuy streamlines your shopping experience, making it faster, easier, and more intuitive.

Features and Conveniences:

- Highlight & Search: Highlight any word or phrase, right-click, and instantly search for it on Amazon.

- One-Click Access: Skip the hassle of switching tabs or typing in search queries—EazyBuy takes you directly to the results.

- Smart Query Optimization: Automatically refines your search for the most relevant product matches.

- Keyboard Shortcuts: Activate the search with an easy-to-remember shortcut, improving your browsing efficiency.

- Secure & Private: No tracking or storing of user data—your searches remain entirely private.

Why Choose EazyBuy?

Save time by eliminating the need to manually switch tabs or copy and paste search terms.
Effortlessly compare products, prices, and reviews in seconds.
Perfect for impulsive shoppers, researchers, and anyone who loves browsing Amazon.
Enhances productivity by keeping your focus on the task at hand while shopping in parallel.

EazyBuy—because shopping should be as simple as highlighting and clicking!
